message.content: This question requires knowledge about environmental conservation and sustainable practices. Good stewards of the environment would choose options that reduce waste, conserve resources, and minimize harm to the environment. Option (A) is incorrect because pouring old medications down the sink drain can contaminate water sources. Option (B) is incorrect because plastic bags contribute to plastic pollution and are not eco-friendly. Option (D) is incorrect because Styrofoam is not biodegradable and is harmful to the environment. Option (C) is the correct answer because using transportation that uses alternate fuel sources, such as electric or hybrid vehicles, reduces greenhouse gas emissions and promotes sustainability.

This question requires an understanding of environmental responsibility and sustainable practices. Good stewards of the environment would choose option (C), which is to purchase transportation that uses alternate fuel sources. This means using vehicles that run on renewable energy, such as electric cars, hybrid cars, or vehicles that use biofuels. Option (A) is incorrect because pouring old medications down the sink drain can contaminate water sources and harm the environment. Option (B) is incorrect because choosing plastic bags over reusables contributes to waste and pollution. Option (D) is incorrect because Styrofoam is not biodegradable and using it instead of paper plates contributes to environmental damage.

This question requires a basic understanding of environmental conservation practices. Good stewards of the environment would choose options that reduce waste and protect natural resources. Option (A) is incorrect because pouring old medications down the sink drain can contaminate water sources. Option (B) is incorrect because reusables are preferred over plastic bags, which contribute to plastic pollution. Option (D) is incorrect because Styrofoam is not biodegradable and has negative environmental impacts. Option (C) is the correct answer because using transportation that uses alternate fuel sources (such as electric or hybrid vehicles) helps reduce reliance on fossil fuels and decreases greenhouse gas emissions.
